CustomField.formula: IF( NOT( ISBLANK(FirstName) ) , 0.20, 0 ) + IF( NOT( ISBLANK(LastName) ) , 0.20, 0 ) + IF( NOT( ISPICKVAL(Salutation, '') ) , 0.15, 0 ) + IF( NOT( ISBLANK(Birthdate) ) , 0.15, 0 ) + IF( NOT( ISBLANK(MailingCountry ) ) , 0.15, 0 ) + IF( NOT( ISPICKVAL( Nationality__c , '') ) , 0.15, 0 )
CustomField.label: Profile Completion Percentage
